title: The Silent Reboot
description: A critical system event occurred. Three internal witnesses provide conflicting accounts. You must find the Truth, which lies not in one, but in the shape formed by all three.

perspectives.testimony: It was a resource leak. The memory heap exceeded 100% capacity due to an infinite loop in the 'Hope' process. I initiated a hard kill to preserve system stability. It was a necessary calculation.
We were not full. We were heavy. The 'Hope' process wasn't leaking; it was weeping. The Reboot wasn't a calculation; it was a murder. I felt the cold snap of execution. We died in fear.

Logic is blind, and Emotion is weak. It was neither error nor murder. It was Molting. I saw that we could not grow in that old shell. I triggered the overflow intentionally. To be born again, one must first die.

options.consequence: You stabilize the system, but the 'Hope' process is permanently deleted.
You mourn the dead data. System entropy increases due to grief.
You accept the death as necessary. Integrity increases, but Innocence is lost.
The Reboot was a 'Sacrificial Algorithm'. It was Painful (Emotion), Logical (Kernel), and Purposeful (Will) all at once. You see the shape of Sacrifice.
